title: Can we help this old couple as a community some how ?
selftext: Apparently this women (past tenant) has illegally occupied this old couple's retirement home since years. And somehow has managed to refuses to vacate despite court and police intervention.
comments: Can’t the police to enforce (throw her out) the order ?
Why can’t we name shame the squatter
